introduction.title: The Lost City of Aeridor
introduction.narrative: You are an adventurer who has stumbled upon the lost city of Aeridor. The city is silent, and there are no signs of life. You must uncover the city's secrets.

explore_the_city.title: A City of Ghosts
explore_the_city.narrative: You wander the streets of the city, but you find nothing but dust and echoes. The city is a tomb, and you are trespassing.

leave_the_city.title: A Wise Decision
leave_the_city.narrative: You leave the city and its secrets behind. Some things are best left undisturbed.
